text: Nde nza phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, nza nde suanga buna mueŋ phorga khar ki. Mba buneŋ khaŋ muuŋgi. Nde nza suaŋv Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨp suaŋrim, ana nzan kurkurarim, Guma Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ vhemkora za kha bigir ŋgɨrim, ana zɨ guigira kɨvgip, ana nde han maam, nden rɨgar zɨ kɨvgi farar muuŋgirga.
